name: SuperPaper02TicTactoe
description:
遊戲規則:
每個3*3的欄位各自分別計算，總共有9個3*3欄位，起手玩家系統會先鎖定在中
間的3*3欄位，起手玩家會先由此處開始下棋，點擊空白格子將會依照相對應
的空白格子中填下您的棋子，之後在每個3*3的欄位之中，輪到你的回合，點擊空白格子將會依照相對應空白格子中填下您的棋子，每次下完棋後，會對應3*3欄位應屬相對位
置，在9*9欄位中僅開放相對應位置中的3*3欄位

勝利條件:
在每個3*3各自分別計算的欄位，其中某3*3欄位中有其玩家連成一條線時，該玩家獲得勝利

特殊規則:
若此位置中的3*3欄位，其欄位格子已經額滿時，最後補上棋子使其額滿的該玩家，會將
在9*9的所有3*3欄位中能指定此位置中的格子給補上該玩家的棋子

[Provide by Google Translate] game rules:
Each 3 * 3 field is calculated separately, there are a total of 9 3 * 3 fields, the starting player system will first lock in
In the 3 * 3 field between, the starting player will start playing chess from here, click on the blank box will be in accordance with the corresponding
Fill in your pawns in the blank space of, then your turn in each 3 * 3 field, click on the blank space will fill in your pawns according to the corresponding blank space, every time you finish After the game, the corresponding 3 * 3 field should be relative
In the 9 * 9 field, only the 3 * 3 field in the corresponding position is opened

Victory conditions:
In each of the 3 * 3 separately calculated fields, where a certain 3 * 3 field has its players connected in a line, the player wins

Special rules:
If the 3 * 3 field in this position has a full grid, the player who last filled the chess piece to make it full will be
In all 3 * 3 fields of 9 * 9, the grid in this position can be designated to supplement the player ’s piece
